response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maximize our earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
